Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Van Buren
ShortDescription: Southbound 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via: Clark, Harrison and Financial Place due to, a Parade near Clark/Van Buren.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via: Clark, Harrison and Financial Place due to, a Parade near Clark/Van Buren.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
